tagline: Fun to pronounce. Fun to use.
body:
# Simple charts for your simple needs.

Are numbers telling you nothing? Is your boss one of those people that won't believe it unless it's charted? `shplot` is for you.

Take a look:

![screenshot](https://raw.github.com/slezica/shplot/master/img/shplot.png)

[Take it for a spin](https://github.com/slezica/shplot). Driving the action are a few lines of python. Collaboration is welcome.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: shplot
